doc.title: One Percent Full
doc.plot: Burton Richardson (Man in the Iron Mask, Kickboxer films) Ronnie Ricketts (Uno), and Andrea Del Rosario (Viva Hot Babe) star in this uplifting story. Shot in Hawaii and Manila, ONE PERCENT FULL is an international, family friendly movie packed with amazing mixed martial arts (MMA) action, but also offers tender moments and lots of laughs. Frank Hopkins (Burton Richardson) is a wealthy American MMA champion living in Honolulu. But Frank is unhappy. Despite the exotic cars, extravagant house, and beautiful women, he can always find something to complain about. His business partner Axel (Charles Jewitt) sends Frank to Manila, Philippines to promote their line of MMA products. Frank's pessimistic attitude irritates his bodyguard, Boy (Ronnie Ricketts), and Boy's sister-in-law, Girly (Andrea Del Rosario). But Frank's life is about to change when he is double-crossed, left penniless, and pursued by the police. Boy saves Frank by taking him to his home in the squatter area. But Axel sends a team of American martial arts experts to capture Frank in Manila. This formidable team is led by their guide Shaquille (Niño Muhlach). Can a rich American survive in a Manila slum? Can he discover the secret to happiness there? Can he find love? "Watch ONE PERCENT FULL---a wonderfully entertaining film for the whole family."
